com.moomoohk.Grame.Essentials
Class Base

java.lang.Object
  com.moomoohk.Grame.Essentials.Base

public class Base
extends java.lang.Object

Bases are the backbone of Grame. They serve as the map in which objects move around and interact with each other.

Since:
2013-04-05
Version:
1.0
Author:
Meshulam Silk

Field Detail

ID

public final int ID
The ID of this Base.

This ID is unique and cannot be changed.
It is this Base's place in the GrameManager's list of Bases.

Method Detail

tick

public void tick()
Ticks the Base.

Users will never need to call this method (The GrameManager takes care of ticking everything).

public boolean isInBase(Coordinates pos)
Checks whether a set of Coordinates are in this Base.

Parameters:
pos - Coordinates to check.
Returns:
True if the Coordinates are in this Base, else false.

                                int place)
Adds a GrameObjectLayer to this base at a specified layer.

Parameters:
gol - GrameObjectLayer to add.
place - Place within this Base's list of GrameObjectLayers.

containsGrameObject

public boolean containsGrameObject(int goID)
Checks whether this Base contains a certain GrameObject.

Parameters:
goID - ID of GrameObject to look for.
Returns:
True if this Base contains the GrameObject, else false.

getGrameObjectPos

public Coordinates getGrameObjectPos(int goID)
Returns the position of a GrameObject that is in this Base.

Parameters:
goID - GrameObject.ID of the GrameObject.
Returns:
Coordinates of the GrameObject. If it is not found null will be returned.

getGrameObjectLayer

public GrameObjectLayer getGrameObjectLayer()
Returns the default GrameObjectLayer of this Base.

Returns:
The default GrameObjectLayer of this Base.

moveGrameObject

public void moveGrameObject(int goID,
                            Coordinates pos)
Moves a GrameObject from its current position to a new position on the same layer.

If the new position already contains a collidable GrameObject it will be consumed by the GrameObject that is being moved there.

Parameters:
goID - The GrameObject.ID of the GrameObject to move.
pos - Coordinates to which the object should move.

isOccupied

public boolean isOccupied(Coordinates pos)
Checks whether a set of Coordinates is occupied on the default layer.

Parameters:
pos - Coordinates to check.
Returns:
True if the Coordinates are occupied on the default layer, else false.
See Also:
isOccupied(Coordinates, int)

isOccupied

public boolean isOccupied(Coordinates pos,
                          int layer)
Checks whether a set of Coordinates is occupied on a specified layer.

Parameters:
pos - Coordinates to check.
layer - Layer to check.
Returns:
True if the Coordinates are occupied on the specified layer, else false.

setWraparound

public void setWraparound(boolean f)
Sets the "wraparound" aspect of this Base.

"Wraparound" means that if a GrameObject tries to go off one side of this Base it will be placed on the other side.
Think of Snake and Pac-Man.

Parameters:
f - True for wraparound, else false.

getWraparound

public boolean getWraparound()
Gets the "wraparound" aspect of this Base.

"Wraparound" means that if a GrameObject tries to go off one side of this Base it will be placed on the other side.
Think of Snake and Pac-Man.

Returns:
True if this Base is a wraparound Base, else false.

getDiagonal

public int getDiagonal()
Returns the length of the diagonal of this Base.

Returns:
The length of the diagonal of this Base.
